Layer.OnCommand:
%function(self) star0 = self
self:hidden(1) self:rotationz(math.random(-360,360)) self:diffuse(0.71,1,1,1) self:wag() self:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) self:effectperiod(4) end

%function(self) star1 = self
self:hidden(1) self:rotationz(math.random(-360,360)) self:diffuse(0.84,1,1,1) self:wag() self:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) self:effectperiod(3.9) end

%function(self) star2 = self
self:hidden(1) self:rotationz(math.random(-360,360)) self:diffuse(0.78,1,1,1) self:wag() self:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) self:effectperiod(3.8) end

%function(self) star3 = self
self:hidden(1) self:rotationz(math.random(-360,360)) self:diffuse(0.71,1,1,1) self:wag() self:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) self:effectperiod(3.7) end

%function(self) star4 = self
self:hidden(1) self:rotationz(math.random(-360,360)) self:diffuse(0.84,1,1,1) self:wag() self:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) self:effectperiod(3.6) end

%function(self) star5 = self
self:hidden(1) self:rotationz(math.random(-360,360)) self:diffuse(0.78,1,1,1) self:wag() self:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) self:effectperiod(3.5) end

%function(self) star6 = self
self:hidden(1) self:rotationz(math.random(-360,360)) self:diffuse(0.71,1,1,1) self:wag() self:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) self:effectperiod(3.4) end

%function(self) star7 = self
self:hidden(1) self:rotationz(math.random(-360,360)) self:diffuse(0.84,1,1,1) self:wag() self:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) self:effectperiod(3.3) end

%function(self) star8 = self
self:hidden(1) self:rotationz(math.random(-360,360)) self:diffuse(0.78,1,1,1) self:wag() self:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) self:effectperiod(3.2) end

%function(self) star9 = self
self:hidden(1) self:rotationz(math.random(-360,360)) self:diffuse(0.71,1,1,1) self:wag() self:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) self:effectperiod(3.1) end

%function(self) star10 = self
self:hidden(1) self:rotationz(math.random(-360,360)) self:diffuse(0.84,1,1,1) self:wag() self:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) self:effectperiod(3) end

%function(self) star11 = self
self:hidden(1) self:rotationz(math.random(-360,360)) self:diffuse(0.78,1,1,1) self:wag() self:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) self:effectperiod(2.9) end

%function(self) star12 = self
self:hidden(1) self:rotationz(math.random(-360,360)) self:diffuse(0.84,1,1,1) self:diffuse(0.71,1,1,1) self:wag() self:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) self:effectperiod(2.8) end

%function(self) star13 = self
self:hidden(1) self:rotationz(math.random(-360,360)) self:diffuse(0.78,1,1,1) self:wag() self:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) self:effectperiod(2.7) end

%function(self) star14 = self
self:hidden(1) self:rotationz(math.random(-360,360)) self:diffuse(0.84,1,1,1) self:wag() self:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) self:effectperiod(2.6) end

%function(self) star15 = self
self:hidden(1) self:rotationz(math.random(-360,360)) self:diffuse(0.71,1,1,1) self:wag() self:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) self:effectperiod(2.5) end

%function(self) star16 = self
self:hidden(1) self:rotationz(math.random(-360,360)) self:diffuse(0.78,1,1,1) self:wag() self:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) self:effectperiod(2.4) end
%function(self) letsgo = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X); self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y); self:hidden(1) self:zoom(1) end
%function(self) imissyou = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X); self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y); self:hidden(1) self:zoom(0.6) end
%function(self) cardoor = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X); self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y); self:hidden(1) self:zoom(0.5) end
%function(self) cardoorbacklight = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X); self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y); self:hidden(1) self:zoom(0.5) end
%function(self) moon = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X-200); self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y); self:hidden(1) self:zoom(0.4) self:wag() self:effectmagnitude(0,0,10) self:effectperiod(2.4) end
%function(self) mpcat = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X); self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y); self:hidden(1) self:zoom(1) end
%function(self) mpflower = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X); self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y); self:hidden(1) self:zoom(1) end
%function(self) mpwtf = self self:x(SCREEN_CENTER_X); self:y(SCREEN_CENTER_Y); self:hidden(1) self:zoom(1) end

%function(self) local m=mod_insert local mm=mod_message local l='len' local e='end'
sprite_spawns = { {32.042,star0,'Animate0'}, {32.292,star1,'Animate1'}, {32.542,star2,'Animate2'}, {32.792,star3,'Animate3'}, {33.042,star4,'Animate4'}, {33.375,star5,'Animate5'}, {33.5008,star6,'Animate6'}, {34.042,star7,'Animate7'}, {34.375,star8,'Animate8'}, {34.408,star9,'Animate9'}, {35.042,star10,'Animate10'}, {35.521,star11,'Animate11'}, {36.021,star12,'Animate12'}, {36.521,star13,'Animate13'}, {37.292,star14,'Animate14'}, {38.521,star15,'Animate15'}, {40.021,star16,'Animate16'}, {168,star0,'Animate0'}, {168.5,star1,'Animate1'}, {169.5,star2,'Animate2'}, {170,star3,'Animate3'}, {171,star4,'Animate4'}, {172,star16,'Animate16'},
}
cardoor_spawns = { {4,cardoor,'AnimateCarDoor'}, {4,cardoorbacklight,'AnimateCarDoorBackLight'}, {5.667,cardoor,'AnimateCarDoor'}, {5.667,cardoorbacklight,'AnimateCarDoorBackLight'}, {7.333,cardoor,'AnimateCarDoor'}, {7.333,cardoorbacklight,'AnimateCarDoorBackLight'}, {9,cardoor,'AnimateCarDoor'}, {9,cardoorbacklight,'AnimateCarDoorBackLight'}, {10.833,cardoor,'AnimateCarDoor'}, {10.833,cardoorbacklight,'AnimateCarDoorBackLight'},
}
mpspawns = { {200,mpcat,'Animatempcat'}, {200,mpflower,'Animatempflower'}, {200.5,mpcat,'Animatempcat'}, {200.5,mpflower,'Animatempflower'},
{201.5,mpcat,'Animatempcat'}, {201.5,mpflower,'Animatempflower'}, {202,mpcat,'Animatempcat'}, {202,mpflower,'Animatempflower'}, {203,mpcat,'Animatempcat'}, {203,mpflower,'Animatempflower'}, {204,mpcat,'Animatempcat'}, {204,mpflower,'Animatempflower'},
} mod_message(17.5,function(self) hej:queuecommand('AnimateHej') end) mod_message(20.75,function(self) hi:queuecommand('AnimateHi') end) mod_message(23,function(self) hej:hidden(1) hi:hidden(1) end) mod_message(132,function(self) moon:queuecommand('AnimateMoon') end) mod_message(200,function(self) moon:hidden(1) end) mod_message(205,function(self) mpwtf:queuecommand('Animatempwtf') end) mod_message(387,function(self) letsgo:queuecommand('AnimateLetsGo') end) mod_message(324.5,function(self) imissyou:queuecommand('AnimateIMissYou') end)
for k,v in pairs(sprite_spawns) do local var2 = v[2] local var3 = v[3] mod_message(v[1]-0.5,function(self) var2:queuecommand(var3) var2:x(math.random(SCREEN_CENTER_X-220,SCREEN_CENTER_X+220)); var2:y(math.random(SCREEN_CENTER_Y-220,SCREEN_CENTER_Y+220)); end)
mod_message(v[1]+8,function(self) var2:hidden(1) end)
end
for k,v in pairs(cardoor_spawns) do local var2 = v[2] local var3 = v[3] mod_message(v[1],function(self) var2:queuecommand(var3) end) mod_message(v[1]+5,function(self) var2:hidden(1) end) end
for k,v in pairs(mpspawns) do local var2 = v[2] local var3 = v[3] mod_message(v[1],function(self) var2:queuecommand(var3) var2:x(math.random(SCREEN_CENTER_X-220,SCREEN_CENTER_X+220)); var2:y(math.random(SCREEN_CENTER_Y-220,SCREEN_CENTER_Y+220)); var2:rotationz(math.random(-40,40)); end) mod_message(v[1]+5,function(self) var2:hidden(1) end) end
if table.getn(mod_actions) > 0 then table.sort(mod_actions, modtable_compare) end end
